Text: Thanks for this.....but, how does one install it on a Mac?  I searched for a .dmg file in the downloaded folders, to no avail.  Help...!

Just copy the app to Application folder or whatever other place you want and run.

It's a zip file with Pocmon.app inside, not a dmg.
